title: John Daunt (golfer)
text: John Hubert Edward Daunt (30 December 1865 – 16 July 1952) was a British <a href="golf">golf</a>er. He competed in the <a href="Golf%20at%20the%201900%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20individual">men's individual event</a> at the <a href="1900%20Summer%20Olympics">1900 Summer Olympics</a>. His father, <a href="John%20Daunt">Colonel John Charles Campbell Daunt</a>, was a recipient of the <a href="Victoria%20Cross">Victoria Cross</a>.
